title: INK: Darken
description: Shay Baynes has just been released from jail but real battle is still well underway. She must learn to use her new powers to stop the evil Specter from killing. She is broken, bruised and scarred but will do all she can to rise from the ashes of her life and continue on her path. The fourth installment of the INK series.
